description: Left empty by his attempts to fuck his way through the pain of heartache, Zion Nicholas decides to confront Cayden Stone at the art studio with a bold maneuver. Stripping, he tells him he'll be his new model, and when Cayden asks him what he's doing, Zion confesses his feelings. Cayden thought they were just friends, but now that the opportunity is in front of him, he has to admit Zion is definitely more his type of muse, one that requires long, hard study to truly capture and appreciate. Luckily for him, Zion has all the time in the world. Looks like this is not just a match, but a masterpiece. Enjoy!
title: The Art Of Love - Part 3
